SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.5: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.5.2: Proportion of businesses that had at least one contact with a public official and that paid a bribe to a public official, or were asked for a bribe by those public officials during the previous 12 months
STAT_CONC_DEF: The percent of firms experiencing at least one bribe payment request across 6 public transactions dealing with utilities access, permits, licenses, and taxes.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.5: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 16.5.2: Proportion of businesses that had at least one contact with a public official and that paid a bribe to a public official, or were asked for a bribe by those public officials during the previous 12 months
un_custodian_agency: World Bank (WB), United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 16 : Promouvoir l’avènement de sociétés pacifiques et inclusives aux fins du développement durable, assurer l’accès de tous à la justice et mettre en place, à tous les niveaux, des institutions efficaces, responsables et ouvertes à tous
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 16.5 : Réduire nettement la corruption et la pratique des pots-de-vin sous toutes leurs formes
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 16.5.2 : Proportion d’entreprises ayant eu au moins une fois affaire à un agent public auquel elles ont versé un pot-de-vin ou qui leur a demandé un pot-de-vin au cours des 12 mois précédents
fr.STAT_CONC_DEF: Pourcentage d’entreprises ayant fait l’objet d’au moins une demande de paiement de pots-de-vin dans le cadre de 6 transactions publiques portant sur l’accès aux services publics, les permis, les licences et les taxes.
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 16 : Promouvoir l’avènement de sociétés pacifiques et inclusives aux fins du développement durable, assurer l’accès de tous à la justice et mettre en place, à tous les niveaux, des institutions efficaces, responsables et ouvertes à tous
